title: League splatting on startup
body:
Hi guys.

My client has decided to stop working today and I can't for the life of me work out to fix it. As soon as open the client it closes again and presents with a bugsplat then tries to reopen itself and the cycle continues until I end it in task manager. 

http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk262/Creamms/images/splat.jpg

I've tried reinstalling, restarting computer, network connections seem fine, ran as admin, ran from folder rather than desktop...

I'm running W7 64bit

Any suggestions would be brill
Thanks

replies.body: Hey, DrHofmann, you have discord open. Try disabling the discord overlay and then reopen the game!
Yeah we've been seeing a sudden huge influx of reports on this happening.  So far, the culprit seems to be Discord Overlay each time.  Disabling it should fix things up! :D
Heh that weirdly worked! I've always had that open like that as it launches on startup. Weird!! Thank :)
